data_table.description: Sample ID, body site where sample was obtained, histological type, analyte type, and tumor status of participants with chronic lymphocytic leukemia and involved in the "National Cancer Institute (NCI) Non-Hodgkin Lymphoma Genome-wide Association Study (GWAS): Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL)" project.

variable.name: BODY_SITE
variable.description: Body site where sample was collected [Inner Oral Cavity, Peripheral Blood]
